message: Creates the look, layout, and features of a website. Help with maintenance and make sure site are up-to-date.

mainDate: July 2009 - Real-IT Web Solutions and Consultancy Corporations
message: Create website with HTML/CSS practices. Working closely with web designers and programmer to produce website. Maintain software documentation, expanding/enhancing the website once built

mainDate: May 2012 - Department of Health Philippines (Head Office) doh.gov.ph
message: Oversee the overall implementation of systems provided by Department of Health Philippines. Install relevant system needed in respective health facilites. Generate service statistics or other relevant reports requested by relevant and authorized offices. Orient and train personnel of local health facilities and drugstores on how to use EDPMS and related health information systems.

Develop and Maintain (DAM) Digital Asset Management - delivery system that will generate music package depends of different platforms using DDEX standard. like: itunes, spotify, google music, youtube audio and video, deezer, Rdio, Xbox, BloomFm, Beats Music, KKbox. Royalty accounting & statistical system this will consolidate royalty payment from different platform like : itunes, spotify, google music, youtube art track and video, deezer, Rdio, Xbox, BloomFm, Beats Music, KKbox. Mymusic, Vevo, Noah, Linn Records, Tune Core, C & L, Avex, Omusic.

Design, develop, modify, debug and/or maintain software code according to functional, non-functional and technical design specifications. Follow Amdocs software engineering standards, applicable software development methodology and release processes, to ensure code is maintainable, scalable, supportable and demo the software products to stakeholders. You will investigate issues by reviewing/debugging code, provides fixes and workarounds, and reviews changes for operability to maintain existing software solutions.

Provide technical leadership to software engineers by coaching and mentoring throughout end-to-end software development, maintenance, and lifecycle to achieve project goals to the required level of quality; promote team engagement and motivation. Provide hands-on technical and functional input to design, maintenance, build, integration and testing of complex software components according to functional and technical design specifications; Follow software development methodologies and release processe. Analyze and provide input for the requirements and provide impact assessment for new features or bug fixes. Make high-level design and establishes technical standards. Represent and lead discussions related to product/application/modules/team and build relationships with internal customers/stakeholders
